price: Dios les muestra Sus milagros [que prueban Su unicidad]. ¿Cuál de los milagros de Dios negarán?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
